Articles.Content: LOL come on dude, give him a break

The current plan is (In Order) Pheonix NX alpha NX-01 (dont you dare tell me the NX-01 is not possbible see if StarVision agrees)

It would be easy, just have the Center of Mass on the nacelles line up with the rest. They don't come up that much. By itself they may be a bit weird but otherwise it would work flawlessly.

it would be easy, just have the center of mass on the nacelles line up with the rest. They don't come up that much. By itself they may be a bit weird but otherwise it would work flawlessly.
